scenes: Wide establishing shot of a misty forest at dawn, camera slowly pushes forward
Camera moves closer, revealing a narrow path winding through ancient trees
The camera lowers and shifts to the right, focusing on morning dew on leaves
Camera pans left as a deer steps into frame, soft light filtering through branches
The camera follows as the deer walks deeper into the forest, atmosphere grows darker
Camera tilts up to reveal the forest canopy, sunlight breaking through in rays
Final wide shot pulling back to show the entire forest landscape bathed in golden light
